ClassicMusicPlayer - Class in controller.musicplayer
A classic music player is a normal music player that at the end of the song goes to the next This class use the basic implementation of a music player defined in the abstract class AbstractMusicPlayer and implements the method of the interface PlaylistFeatureCommand

convertURLPath(String) - Static method in class view.config.Utility
Thank you http://stackoverflow.com/questions/4050087/how-to-obtain-the-last-path-segment-of-an-uri for the first replacement This method expect a song name like type %Artist%-%Album%-%Title% It change the string so that it matches %Title%.
